_header: Ye that desire in heart and have plesaunce
_description: Shirley’s Book Motto — one stanza rhyme royal

BodAsh59.First Lines:
Yee þat desyre in herte and have plesaunceOlde stories in
                    bokis for to redeGode matiers putt hem in remembranceAnd of þe
                    oþer take yee none hede…
BodAsh59.Last Lines:
…Whane yee þis boke haue over redde and seyneTo Johan
                    Shirley restore yee it ageine
